casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Antione Cedric MCKENITH No. 355P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Mark L. Hayes, Attorney at Law, for McKenith, Antione Cedric. Kathryn E. Hathcock, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of October 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
